item.title: 英国国家养老金投资者考虑入股泰晤士水务公司
item.description: 英国最大的养老基金之一表示，如果泰晤士河水务公司重组并出售，它可能会考虑投资该公司。【原文：One of the UK’s largest pension funds has said it may consider investing in Thames Water if the stricken utility is restructured and put up for sale.】

item.title: 泰国央行行长警告不要调整通胀目标
item.description: 泰国央行行长警告说，任何提高货币当局通胀目标的举动都可能使预期失去支撑，导致物价上涨加快，从而给经济增长带来风险。【原文：Thailand’s central bank governor warned that any move to raise the monetary authority’s inflation target may unanchor expectations and result in quickening price gains, which carries risks for economic growth.】

item.title: 欧洲动荡引发避险情绪，美元测试 2024 年高点
item.description: 随着美国国债收益率的上升，以及投资者为躲避欧洲政治不确定性而涌向世界储备货币，美元正在徘徊于 2024 年的新高。【原文：The dollar is flirting with a new 2024 high as elevated US Treasury yields and investors seeking shelter from political uncertainty in Europe flock to the world’s reserve currency.】

item.title: Blackstone 拟以 17 亿美元收购日本电子漫画公司 Infocom
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 已同意收购日本电子漫画提供商 Infocom Corp.【原文：Blackstone Inc. has agreed to buy Japanese e-comics provider Infocom Corp. in a deal valuing the company at about 275 billion yen ($1.7 billion), according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 印度市场热点：消费类股票可能受减税政策提振
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: 香港将于 9 月下旬起允许在台风期间进行交易
item.description: 香港行政长官李约瑟表示，香港将从 9 月 25 日起结束长达数十年的在台风和大风暴期间关闭街市的做法。【原文：Hong Kong will end its decades-long practice of shutting its markets during typhoons and major storms starting on Sept. 25, the city’s Chief Executive John Lee said.】

item.title: 摩根大通即将加入，Ashmore 将购买更多印度债券
item.description: 随着印度政府债券在 6 月底被纳入摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Ashmore Group Plc plans to boost its holdings of Indian government bonds as they get included into the JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s key emerging-market index by the end of June.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美股创下今年第 30 个纪录。花旗银行推出改革 "皇冠上的明珠"。买入台积电股票这一最受欢迎的套利策略变得痛苦不堪。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US stocks hit their 30th record this year. Citi unveils its “crown jewel” in revamp. A favorite arbitrage strategy of buying TSMC shares becomes painful. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 风险偏好情绪支撑大宗商品，石油保持涨势
item.description: 由于更广泛市场的风险情绪盖过了原油喜忧参半的前景，石油保持了一周以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Oil held the biggest advance in a week as risk-on sentiment in wider markets overshadowed a mixed outlook for crude.】

item.title: 如果投资有保障，英国石油产量将比预测高出 30
item.description: 据一个行业组织称，如果能获得约 200 亿英镑的新投资，到本世纪末，英国的石油和天然气产量将比目前预计的多出近 30%。【原文：The UK could be pumping almost 30% more oil and gas than current projected at the end of the decade if about £20 billion of new investment can be secured, according to an industry group.】

item.title: 爱尔兰将迎来温和增长，产能限制依然存在
item.description: 爱尔兰央行警告说，爱尔兰政府需要集中精力解决影响经济增长的产能限制问题。【原文：The Irish government needs to focus its attention on fixing capacity-constraint issues that are impacting growth, the central bank warned.】

item.title: 南非新政府合作伙伴为内阁之争做好准备
item.description: 在西里尔-拉马福萨总统准备宣誓就职新一届任期之际，上周同意组成执政联盟的南非各政党正在为争夺内阁职位做准备。【原文：South African political parties that last week agreed to form a governing alliance are limbering up for a tussle over cabinet positions, as President Cyril Ramaphosa prepares to be sworn in for a new term.】

item.title: 亚洲股市追随创纪录的华尔街：市场综述
item.description: 由于几家大型科技公司的反弹推动美国股市再创新高，亚洲股票基准周二将高开。【原文：Asian equity benchmarks are set to open higher Tuesday as a rally in several large technology companies drove US stocks to another record.】

item.title: 布莱恩-谢菲尔德（Bryan Sheffield）支持的澳大利亚天然气钻井商着眼于在美国上市
item.description: 由得克萨斯州石油商布莱恩-谢菲尔德（Bryan Sheffield）支持的坦博兰资源公司（Tamboran Resources Corp.【原文：Tamboran Resources Corp., backed by Texas oilman Bryan Sheffield, is seeking to raise as much as $175.5 million from an initial public offering in New York in a bid to expand its shareholder base to US shale gas investors.】

item.title: 马拉松首席执行官称，PE 公司利用薄弱的债务契约是明智之举
item.description: 马拉松资产管理公司（Marathon Asset Management）首席执行官布鲁斯-理查兹（Bruce Richards）周一在彭博电视上表示，私募股权公司利用疲软的贷款协议为陷入困境的投资组合公司筹集新资金是明智之举。【原文：Private equity firms exploiting weak lending agreements to raise new money for struggling portfolio companies are wise to do so, Marathon Asset Management Chief Executive Officer Bruce Richards said on Bloomberg Television Monday.】

item.title: 他信将被起诉，法院正在权衡泰国总理的未来
item.description: 泰国前领导人他信-西那瓦（Thaksin Shinawatra）将于周二被正式起诉犯有诽谤王室罪，同时法院将对要求取消总理素拉塔-塔维信（Srettha Thavisin）资格的请求进行权衡；这两起备受瞩目的案件有可能使这个东南亚国家陷入政治动荡。【原文：Former Thai leader Thaksin Shinawatra is set to be formally indicted in a royal defamation charge Tuesday while a court weighs a petition to disqualify Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin — two high profile cases that threaten to plunge the Southeast Asian nation into political turmoil.】

item.title: 页岩巨头 EOG 认为欧佩克+减产将平衡全球石油市场
item.description: 美国页岩油巨头 EOG Resources 公司称，石油输出国组织及其盟国协调减少原油产量已导致全球石油市场趋于平衡。【原文：Coordinated crude output reductions by the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries and its allies have led to a balanced global oil market, according to US shale giant EOG Resources Inc.】

item.title: 花旗上调美股前景，加入高盛和 Evercore ISI 的行列
item.description: 花旗集团的斯科特-克罗尼特（Scott Chronert）表示，美国科技巨头股价的上涨很可能继续推动 S&P 500 指数创下新高。【原文：Gains in the shares of American technology giants are likely to keep pushing the S&P 500 Index to new highs, says Citigroup Inc.’s Scott Chronert.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Regal 看空澳大利亚最大银行
item.description: 资深对冲基金经理菲利普-金（Philip King）看空澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）股票，理由是该公司是全球估值最昂贵的银行之一。【原文：Veteran hedge fund manager Philip King has taken a short position in shares of Commonwealth Bank of Australia, citing one of the world’s most expensive valuations.】

item.title: Baker Europastry 即将启动首次公开募股，筹资 5 亿欧元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙面包和糕点生产商 Europastry SA 正计划在马德里进行首次公开募股，这也是欧洲新股上市活动在经历了两年的低迷后的一次复苏。【原文：Spanish bread and pastry maker Europastry SA is planning to launch an initial public offering in Madrid, amid a revival in new listings in Europe following two years of muted activity, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 波多黎各委员会寻求举行听证会以修订公用事业公司的债务计划
item.description: 在上诉法院上周裁定债券持有人对波多黎各电力公司未来的净收入拥有要求权后，波多黎各财政监督委员会正寻求重开对该岛电力公司债务重组计划的确认听证会。【原文：Puerto Rico’s financial oversight board is seeking to reopen a confirmation hearing on a debt-restructuring plan for the island’s power utility after an appeals court last week ruled that bondholders have a claim to the agency’s future net revenue.】

item.title: 英伟达超越苹果，710 亿美元 ETF 大洗牌在即
item.description: 世界上最著名的科技 ETF 之一似乎准备进行一次大的调整，这将增加对英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的投资，而牺牲苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：One of the world’s most prominent technology ETFs looks poised for a big rebalancing that would ramp up exposure to Nvidia Corp. at the expense of Apple Inc. – spurring billions of dollars in trading volume in one fell swoop.】

item.title: Trafigura 向美国商品期货交易委员会支付 5500 万美元，就操纵案达成和解
item.description: 全球最大的大宗商品交易商之一 Trafigura 集团被美国指控操纵燃油基准并阻止员工与监管机构合作，该公司同意支付 5500 万美元。【原文：Trafigura Group, one of the world’s largest commodity traders, agreed to pay $55 million over US allegations that it manipulated a fuel oil benchmark and blocked employees from cooperating with regulators.】

item.title: 丰业银行称市场对国民银行与西雅图银行的交易过于消极
item.description: 加拿大国家银行宣布有意收购加拿大西部银行后，其股价受到了过于严厉的惩罚，新斯科舍银行称该交易为 "战略赢家"。【原文：National Bank of Canada shares are being punished too harshly after announcing its intent to buy Canadian Western Bank, according to Bank of Nova Scotia, which called the deal a “strategic winner.”】

item.title: 能源类股票发行稀少，卡尔加里银行家面临风险
item.description: 加拿大股票市场的股票发行正在反弹，但石油和天然气公司除外，这些公司的股票发行已经枯竭，以至于投资银行正在缩减在卡尔加里的活动。【原文：Stock offerings are rebounding across Canada’s equity market, except for oil and gas companies, where issuance has dried up to the point that investment banks are scaling back their activities in Calgary.】

item.title: 被指与欧佩克勾结的前先锋公司首席执行官与华盛顿游说公司合作
item.description: 在美国联邦贸易委员会称先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources Co.）前总裁斯科特-谢菲尔德（Scott Sheffield）试图与石油输出国组织（OPEC）勾结后，他聘请了一家实力雄厚的华盛顿游说公司。【原文：Scott Sheffield, the former head of Pioneer Natural Resources Co., has hired a powerful Washington, DC lobbying firm after the US Federal Trade Commission said he tried to collude with OPEC.】

item.title: EchoStar's Hughes 的债权人聘请律师调查租赁交易
item.description: 休斯卫星系统公司（Hughes Satellite Systems Corp.）的一些债权人聘请律师事务所 Glenn Agre Bergman & Fuentes 审查一项昂贵的租赁安排，据熟悉情况的人士称，他们认为该安排将现金从休斯卫星系统公司转移到其母公司 EchoStar。【原文：Some creditors to Hughes Satellite Systems Corp. engaged law firm Glenn Agre Bergman & Fuentes to scrutinize a costly lease arrangement that they say funnels cash away from the unit to its parent EchoStar, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 具有 100% 胜率信号的交易指标 立即卖出多头债券
item.description: 今年交易记录完美的一种技术交易策略发出信号，在上周反弹之后，是时候卖出长期国债了。【原文：A technical trading strategy with a perfect trading record this year is signaling that it’s time to sell long-maturity Treasuries after a rally last week.】

item.title: Antares 将为第三期优先贷款基金筹资约 60 亿美元
item.description: 尽管私人信贷融资趋冷，Antares Capital 仍希望为其第三支优先贷款基金筹集多达 60 亿美元的资金。【原文：Antares Capital is looking to raise as much as $6 billion for its third senior loan fund despite a cooldown in private credit fundraising.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称阿根廷将把实际利率提高到正值水平
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周一表示，阿根廷将把实际利率调至正值，并放宽货币管制，因为这个危机频发的国家正寻求继续放缓物价上涨，并保护其外汇储备。【原文：The International Monetary Fund said Monday that Argentina will move real interest rates into positive territory and ease currency controls as the crisis-prone nation seeks to continue a slowdown in price increases and protect its foreign exchange reserves.】
